Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Biomedical Material/Reagent/Image Enhancement Agent/Contrast Agent/Iodinated Contrast Agent/Iothalamic Acid
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An ionic tri-iodinated benzoate used as a contrast agent in diagnostic imaging. Like other organic iodine compounds, iothalamic acid blocks x-ray and appears opaque on x-ray film, thereby enhancing the visibility of structure and organs during angiography, arteriography, arthrography, cholangiography, and computed tomography (CT) scanning procedures.
